Name: room.luminacaves.start
Description: A dimly lit stone chamber. There's a draft from the north.

Name: room.luminacaves.chamber.echoes
Description: Whispers seem to float in the air. You feel watched.

GatheringSpots.Name: Iron Vein
GatheringSpots.Description: A rich seam of iron embedded in the rock.

Name: room.luminacaves.passage.dark
Description:
The cave gets smaller here again, it looks like an passsage to another chamber though you can't see the end ... 
or even your hand

GatheringSpots.Name: Iron Vein
GatheringSpots.Description: A rich seam of iron embedded in the rock.

Name: room.luminacaves.passage.abyss
Description: It looks like an Passage lit by faintly glowing mushrooms, though the end seems like and endless dark

GatheringSpots.Name: Iron Vein
GatheringSpots.Description: A rich seam of iron embedded in the rock.

Name: room.luminacaves.chamber.hollowcrypt
Description: It's astonishing that you find an old crpt in those Caves, carved into the wall of this chamber, it seems that you get closer to the exit.

Name: room.crypt.portal
Description: The Passage to the portal is dark, filled with faint noises of steam or some sort hitting metal.

Name: room.crypt.chapel
Description:
The Chapel is round with an high rising dome in the middle,
sough no sunlight reaches this monumental room,
some glossoms spend faintly light from all sides of the room

Name: room.crypt.chamber.east
Description: It gets clear that this crypt was build by draws, though there's no trace why they left it.

Name: room.crypt.attrium
Description:
The room is gigantic, with two rows of pillars going through the room,
the ciling is made up of countless arches.
before you at the other end of the room sits an magastic altar and behind it seems to be an old drawen Titan.

Name: room.crypt.chamber.west
Description: It looks like a copy of the eastern side, though the tombs look more elegant.

Name: room.lumina.center
Description: A peaceful hilltop city where adventureres begin their journey.

Name: room.lumina.north
Description: The northern gate of the city, you can hear the sound of a smith hammering away at the metal.

Name: room.lumina.east
Description: The eastern Gate of the City, you can hear the sounds of the Forest Edge. Many adventurers are passing by.

Name: room.cera.valley
Description: A valley in the mountains, the air is filled with the scent of pine trees.

Name: room.cera.river
Description: A river flows through the valley, the water is crystal clear. A Bridge spans the river, it looks like it's been there for a long time.

Name: room.ceralith.outskirts
Description: A small town nestled in the mountains, the town is filled with people, but it's mostly farmers.

Name: room.ceralith.center
Description: The small City of Ceralith, it's a small town, but it's filled with people.

Name: room.ceralith.east
Description: You can already see the wide plains with many acres of farmland.

Name: room.cera.farmland
Description: An small street with many farmes and fields.

Name: room.cera.hill
Description: A Hill on the edge of the forest, at the top you can see an small outpost.

Name: room.whisperingwoods.edge
Description: A small forest, the trees are tall and the air is filled with the scent of pine.

Name: room.whisperingwoods.path
Description: A path through the eastern side of the forest, the path is covered in moss and the sound of a stream.

Name: room.whisperingwoods.crossroads
Description: A crossroads in the forest, to the south you can see the end of the forest, to the west it seems to go deeper into the woods.

Name: room.whisperingwoods.hollow
Description: A hollow in the forest, the air is filled with the scent of pine trees. You feel a sense of unease.

Name: room.whisperingwoods.lumina
Description: A sawmill in the forest, the air is filled with the scent of pine trees. You can still see Lumina's Rise in the distance.

Name: room.sunstone.pass
Description: As you leave the forest, you see a small pass through the mountains. From up here you can see over the whole forest and even make out the farmlands of Ceralith.

Name: room.elor.plateau
Description: You reach an plateau after the steep incline through the mountain pass. You can see the great city of Elorium in the distance.

Name: room.elorium.north.gate
Description: The gate is gigantic, it's walls decorated with black marble. It's very lively, you can hear the sound of people talking and laughing.

Name: room.elorium.north.district
Description: Even though you are at the outermost district of Elorium, the streets are still filled with people. You can see the cathedral in the distance.

Name: room.elorium.center.spellbound
Description: The famous Spellbound Street, it's a big street with many shops and restaurants. Under which are many spell book stores.

Name: room.elorium.center.market
Description: A market in the forest, the air is filled with the scent of pine trees. You can still see Lumina's Rise in the distance.

Name: room.elorium.center.cathedral
Description: A Cathedral in the forest, the air is filled with the scent of pine trees. You can still see Lumina's Rise in the distance.

Name: room.elorium.center
Description: The city center of Elorium, the streets are filled with people, you see the Guild Hall.

Name: room.elorium.east.gate
Description: The eastern gate seems to be closed, you can hear the sounds of an intense battle.

Name: room.elorium.south.district
Description: An huge District, though it seems to be mostly a slum. You can see the Cathedral Tower towering over the District like an laughing shadow

Name: room.elorium.east.district
Description: An buissy District, many people gather on the streets, you can make out an closter where the Clergy live.

Name: room.elorium.south.manufacturers
Description: The production heart of Elorium, many people comute here, to get their products to the market.

Name: room.elorium.palace
Description: An biutiful Palace, with an gigantic garden, the place is filled with people.

Name: room.elorium.center.academy
Description: The renound Academy of Elorium, here you can learn many skills, from magic to healing to fighting and shooting.
